alert.note: Alert for Logan; Mason; Tazewell (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:00AM CDT until May 07 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LOGAN...TAZEWELL AND EAST CENTRAL MASON COUNTIES... At 1159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Morton to San Jose to Easton, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 1153 PM, emergency management reported dime size airport near the South Pekin airport. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Morton, Tremont and Delavan around 1205 AM CDT. Mackinaw and Emden around 1210 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Goodfield, Hartsburg and Armington. This includes the following highways... Interstate 155 between mile markers 1 and 31. Interstate 74 between mile markers 101 and 106. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Lincoln.
